content.text:
# 2nd Golden Horse Awards

The 2nd Golden Horse Awards () took place on October 30, 1963 at Kuo Kuang Cinema in Taipei, Taiwan.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first, highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable
|-
| valign="top" width="50%"|

| valign="top" width="50%"|
* Fishing Industry in Taiwan
**51st National Day of the Republic of China (runner-up)
**''Today's Taiwan (runner-up)
